review: this is not a review... i am interested in the fire stick but am uncertain of how it works. Do i need to have a previous WIFI provider for this to work? or does it act as its own signal?
author: eric martin

review: Exceeded our expectations. Stream without any interruptions.
author: Angela Schenk

review: works like a charm and very easy to use.
author: Shara Bergeron-Scherer

review: I have enjoyed the Fire Stick and had it set up and working in just a few minutes.  I have used it to watch the entire Downton Abbey series from season 1 to 6 (first 5 seasons were free; season 6 was about $20.)  My husband has enjoyed the free movie selections- although they are not the most recent blockbusters, they do offer some previous hits for free.
author: picky1

review: Sometimes it response slows down or unresponsive to the remote
author: Israel F.

review: I can't believe I've never heard of this before!! If it's new then everyone should hv this product! I love it! When u get urs download the "Just Rain" app.. it is the sh_t!!!
author: Jay

review: Very easy to set up, very fast (compared to our previous Roku stick), highly recommended
author: Amazon Customer

review: I use it for wwe network and works like a champ!
